acidity.notes: Glowing plum, just a hint of bitterness (that does not overwhelm the cup).

sweetness.notes: Mellow, well-balanced with acidity, perhaps a little '2D'.

finish.notes: Astringent, dusty, tongue and throat are extremely dry halfway through the cup. Acidic taste lingers.

flavor: Overextracted and the most astringent cup I can remember, but not empty nor overpowered with bitterness. Interesting how changing the grind by one click dramatically thickened the body.
notes: Vigorous swirl bloom with 70g water for 8 seconds, poured 200g by 1:00, finished pour by 1:25. Drawdown was very slow in final stages, so I had to assist a bit. Completely different behavior than grind 23, possibly more fines.
actionItem: Try your last batch at grind 24 for science :D.
